snippet: Brian Vickers took the lead late and won at New Hampshire Motor Speedway in Loudon, ending a 75-race Nascar Sprint Cup losing streak with his third series win.
abstract: Brian Vickers wins at New Hampshire Motor Speedway in Loudon, ending a 75-race Nascar Sprint Cup losing streak with his third series win; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brian Vickers took the lead late and won at New Hampshire Motor Speedway in Loudon, ending a 75-race Nascar Sprint Cup losing streak with his third series win.

headline.main: Surprise Sprint Cup Win by Vickers in New Hampshire
headline.print_headline: Surprise Win by Vickers in New Hampshire
